title: Online Reservations (Beta)
abstract: So, now you can book tables through YAMU, thanks to our integration with Reztguru.
author: indi
content:
Now you can book tables online, through YAMU. Here's the places where you can do it:
This feature is thanks to our integration with Reztguru and we'll be adding more places each week.
To use the system, just click the 'Reservations' link under the phone number. That'll take you to the widget on the sidebar that does the booking. Just enter the date, time and booking details and then you'll get SMS and email confirmation.
How it works is that the reservation gets entered directly into the computer systems at the restaurant. It's really booked and it really works. Check it out and tell us what you think. You can see
.
If you have questions or want to sign up your own restaurant, contact Shamantha on 767 222 220 (9 AM to 6 PM).
